item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

try making the npc that ur using it towards the top of the autospawn list, and it should work…there is a bug with the hextoint, for the slot if the slot is over a certain number it returns negative number and causes array out of bounds

let me know if it works[br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 05:08:11 PM[/size][hr]actually there is more than that wrong, the way u figured out the npc slot and itemslot is off
only way i know how to do it, is try each way until u got it…so i’m no help there…

item.title: Need help badly with this code
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

case 57: // Use item on npc
int itemUsedSlot1 = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int useitemonnpc = playerItems[itemUsedSlot1]-1;
NPCSlot = ((misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000) - 128);
NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
FishingGo = false;
PutNPCCoords = false;
if(useitemonnpc == 1 && NPCID == 1) {
addItem(1, 4);
}
break;

that 1 compiles but when u use it opn the npc it crashes

item.title: Need help badly with this code
item.dc:creator: @billysmither billysmither
item.description:
@billysmither wrote:

Ok thenere well i neeed help on how to code this for my Hunters skill code

ok thern well at the moment to get exp you use a item with another item which looks a bit like this

				else if(itemUsed == 1755 && useWith == 1511) {
					if(huntLevel >= 0) {
						deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
                    				addhuntXP(568);
						sendMessage("you throw the spear at the birds");
						sendMessage("that solved that, the birds all fly away");
					} else {
						sendMessage("You need 0 Hunting level to do this");
					}
				}

Now i need to know this how do it code it so that players can use an item on a npc

like my expample is ::
you click use on a big net and then you can use the big net on a bear and capture the bear but i need to know how to make a code so i can click use on the item and use it on the bear and gain exp

please can someone help me im going to go crazy if i dont figure this out hee hee

All the people that help me “Many Thanks To You People”

Read full topic
